text: Yao Beina (born 姚贝娜; 26 September 1981 - 16 January 2015) was a Chinese singer and actress. She was born in Wuhan, Hubei. She sang "Let It Go" for the Chinese version of Frozen. She was known for her song "The Painted 2" and "Life in the River" Beina died of breast cancer in Shenzhen, Guangdong, aged 33. ==References== ==Other websites== * Yao Beina Memorial website Category:1981 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in China Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Chinese singers Category:Chinese movie actors Category:People from Hubei
title: Yao Beina
